All Trademark Services
Besides Trademark Registration, we offer several trademark related services.
Go
Trademark Registration
Project your brand today, register your trademark in anv country of the world.
Trademark Watch
Monitor new filed trademarks in search for similar trademarks that my infringe upon your trademark.
Trademark Renewals
Renew the validity of your registration. In general, the must be done every 10 years.
WIPO Registration - Madrid System
File one application and obtain trademark protection in multiple countries.
Trademark Transfer
Transfer trademark ownership rights to the person or entity you need.
Trademark Defences
Our trademark Attorneys can help you in any official or legal action that you might require.
